meta.description: C-bet frequency and sizing training by texture

scenarios.explanation_zh: 乾燥A高牌面，IP 位置應高頻率小尺寸 C-bet（約75%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Dry ace-high board, IP should c-bet at high frequency with small sizing (~75%, 33% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 乾燥K高牌面，IP 位置應中高頻率中等尺寸 C-bet（約60%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Dry king-high board, IP should c-bet at medium-high frequency with medium sizing (~60%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 乾燥Q高牌面，IP 位置應中高頻率中等尺寸 C-bet（約55%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Dry queen-high board, IP should c-bet at medium-high frequency (~55%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 乾燥低牌彩虹，有利於跟注者範圍，應低頻率大尺寸 C-bet（約35%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Dry low rainbow favors caller's range, use low frequency large sizing (~35%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 高對子牌面，極高頻率小尺寸 C-bet（約70%頻率，25% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: High paired board, very high frequency small sizing c-bet (~70%, 25% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 低對子牌面，中高頻率小尺寸 C-bet（約65%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Low paired board, medium-high frequency small sizing (~65%, 33% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 濕潤大牌連接，中等頻率大尺寸 C-bet（約45%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Wet broadway connected, medium frequency large sizing (~45%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 濕潤中間連接，中等頻率大尺寸 C-bet（約40%頻率，75% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Wet middle connected, medium frequency large sizing (~40%, 75% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 濕潤低牌連接，低頻率中等尺寸 C-bet（約30%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Wet low connected, low frequency medium sizing (~30%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 單花牌面，中等頻率中等尺寸 C-bet（約50%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Monotone board, medium frequency medium sizing (~50%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 雙花乾燥，中高頻率中等尺寸 C-bet（約55%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Two-tone dry, medium-high frequency medium sizing (~55%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 雙花濕潤，低頻率大尺寸 C-bet（約35%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Two-tone wet, low frequency large sizing (~35%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 3-bet 底池乾燥A高，更高頻率更小尺寸（約80%頻率，25% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: 3-bet pot dry ace-high, even higher frequency smaller sizing (~80%, 25% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 3-bet 底池乾燥K高，高頻率小尺寸（約70%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: 3-bet pot dry king-high, high frequency small sizing (~70%, 33% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 3-bet 底池濕潤中間連接，中等頻率中等尺寸（約50%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: 3-bet pot wet middle connected, medium frequency medium sizing (~50%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: OOP 乾燥A高，稍低頻率但仍使用小尺寸（約60%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: OOP dry ace-high, slightly lower frequency but still small sizing (~60%, 33% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: OOP 濕潤中間連接，更需要保護，低頻率大尺寸（約30%頻率，75% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: OOP wet middle connected, need more protection, low frequency large sizing (~30%, 75% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: OOP 高對子牌面，仍然高頻率小尺寸（約65%頻率，25% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: OOP high paired board, still high frequency small sizing (~65%, 25% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 濕潤大牌三連張，中等頻率大尺寸（約45%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Wet broadway three connectors, medium frequency large sizing (~45%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 濕潤低牌三連張，低頻率中等尺寸（約30%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Wet low three connectors, low frequency medium sizing (~30%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 雙花乾燥K高，中高頻率中等尺寸（約55%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Two-tone dry king-high, medium-high frequency medium sizing (~55%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: AKQ 大牌三連張，中等頻率大尺寸（約50%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: AKQ top broadway, medium frequency large sizing (~50%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 低對子牌面，中高頻率小尺寸（約65%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Low paired board, medium-high frequency small sizing (~65%, 33% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 單花Q高，中等頻率中等尺寸（約50%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Monotone queen-high, medium frequency medium sizing (~50%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: J高彩虹斷開，屬於乾燥低牌，低頻率大尺寸（約35%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: J-high rainbow disconnected, low frequency large sizing (~35%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: A高半連接彩虹，仍屬乾燥A高，高頻率小尺寸（約70%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Ace-high semi-connected rainbow, still dry ace-high, high frequency small sizing (~70%, 33% pot)
scenarios.texture_zh: A + 一張大牌 + 低牌

scenarios.explanation_zh: 雙花半連接大牌，雙花濕潤，低頻率大尺寸（約40%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Two-tone semi-connected broadway, two-tone wet, low frequency large sizing (~40%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 3-bet 底池乾燥低牌，中等頻率中等尺寸（約45%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: 3-bet pot dry low rainbow, medium frequency medium sizing (~45%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 3-bet 底池高對子，極高頻率小尺寸（約75%頻率，25% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: 3-bet pot high paired, very high frequency small sizing (~75%, 25% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 中間半連接，濕潤中間，中等頻率大尺寸（約45%頻率，75% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Middle semi-connected, wet middle, medium frequency large sizing (~45%, 75% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 雙花A高斷開，雙花乾燥，中高頻率中等尺寸（約60%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Two-tone ace-high disconnected, two-tone dry, medium-high frequency medium sizing (~60%, 50% pot)
scenarios.texture_zh: A + 一張大牌 + 低牌

scenarios.explanation_zh: 雙花半連接中間牌，雙花濕潤，低頻率大尺寸（約35%頻率，66% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: Two-tone semi-connected middle cards, two-tone wet, low frequency large sizing (~35%, 66% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: 3-bet 底池低牌三連張，中等頻率中等尺寸（約40%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: 3-bet pot low three connectors, medium frequency medium sizing (~40%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: OOP 乾燥K高，中等頻率中等尺寸（約50%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: OOP dry king-high, medium frequency medium sizing (~50%, 50% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: OOP 低對子牌面，中高頻率小尺寸（約60%頻率，33% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: OOP low paired board, medium-high frequency small sizing (~60%, 33% pot)

scenarios.explanation_zh: OOP 單花A高，中等頻率中等尺寸（約45%頻率，50% pot）
scenarios.explanation_en: OOP monotone ace-high, medium frequency medium sizing (~45%, 50% pot)
